Adds attributes to XML elements
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $elements the element(s) to which you wish to add the attribute
$attrNames the name(s) of the attribute(s) to add
$attrValues the value(s) of the attribute(s) to add

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:add-attributes
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:add-attributes($elements as element(*)*, $attrNames as xs:QName*, $attrValues as xs:anyAtomicType*) as element(*)?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Adds months to a date
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $months the number of months to add

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:add-months
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:add-months($date as xs:anyAtomicType?, $months as xs:integer) as xs:date?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Adds attributes to XML elements
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $elements the element(s) to which you wish to add the attribute
$attrNames the name(s) of the attribute(s) to add
$attrValues the value(s) of the attribute(s) to add

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:add-or-update-attributes
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:add-or-update-attributes($elements as element(*)*, $attrNames as xs:QName*, $attrValues as xs:anyAtomicType*) as element(*)?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Whether a value is all whitespace or a zero-length string
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:all-whitespace
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:all-whitespace($arg as xs:string?) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Whether all the values in a sequence are distinct
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:are-distinct-values
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:are-distinct-values($seq as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The built-in type of an atomic value
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $values the value(s) whose type you want to determine

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:atomic-type
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:atomic-type($values as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:string*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The average, counting "empty" values as zero
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $allNodes the sequence of all nodes to find the average over

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:avg-empty-is-zero
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:avg-empty-is-zero($values as xs:anyAtomicType*, $allNodes as node()*) as xs:double

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Whether a value is between two provided values
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:between-exclusive
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:between-exclusive($value as xs:anyAtomicType?, $minValue as xs:anyAtomicType, $maxValue as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Whether a value is between two provided values, or equal to one of them
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:between-inclusive
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:between-inclusive($value as xs:anyAtomicType?, $minValue as xs:anyAtomicType, $maxValue as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Turns a camelCase string into space-separated words
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $delim the delimiter for the words (e.g. a space)

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:camel-case-to-words
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:camel-case-to-words($arg as xs:string?, $delim as xs:string) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Capitalizes the first character of a string
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $arg the word or phrase to capitalize

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:capitalize-first
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:capitalize-first($arg as xs:string?) as xs:string?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Changes the names of elements in an XML fragment
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $oldNames the sequence of names to change from
$newNames the sequence of names to change to

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:change-element-names-deep
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:change-element-names-deep($nodes as node()*, $oldNames as xs:QName*, $newNames as xs:QName*) as node()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Changes the namespace of XML elements and its descendants
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $prefix the prefix to use for the new namespace

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:change-element-ns-deep
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:change-element-ns-deep($nodes as node()*, $newns as xs:string, $prefix as xs:string) as node()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Changes the namespace of XML elements
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $prefix the prefix to use for the new namespace

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:change-element-ns
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:change-element-ns($elements as element(*)*, $newns as xs:string, $prefix as xs:string) as element(*)?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a string to a sequence of characters
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:chars
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:chars($arg as xs:string?) as xs:string*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Whether a string contains any of a sequence of strings
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:contains-any-of
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:contains-any-of($arg as xs:string?, $searchStrings as xs:string*) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Whether one string contains another, without regard to case
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:contains-case-insensitive
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:contains-case-insensitive($arg as xs:string?, $substring as xs:string) as xs:boolean?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Whether one string contains another, as a separate word
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:contains-word
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:contains-word($arg as xs:string?, $word as xs:string) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Copies attributes from one element to another
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $copyTo the element to copy attributes to
$copyFrom the element to copy attributes from

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:copy-attributes
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:copy-attributes($copyTo as element(*), $copyFrom as element(*)) as element(*)

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Construct a date from a year, month and day
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:date
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:date($year as xs:anyAtomicType, $month as xs:anyAtomicType, $day as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:date

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Construct a date/time from individual components
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:dateTime
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:dateTime($year as xs:anyAtomicType, $month as xs:anyAtomicType, $day as xs:anyAtomicType, $hour as xs:anyAtomicType, $minute as xs:anyAtomicType, $second as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:dateTime

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The day of the year (a number between 1 and 366)
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:day-in-year
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:day-in-year($date as xs:anyAtomicType?) as xs:integer?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The abbreviated day of the week, from a date, in English
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:day-of-week-abbrev-en
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:day-of-week-abbrev-en($date as xs:anyAtomicType?) as xs:string?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The name of the day of the week, from a date, in English
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:day-of-week-name-en
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:day-of-week-name-en($date as xs:anyAtomicType?) as xs:string?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The day of the week, from a date
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:day-of-week
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:day-of-week($date as xs:anyAtomicType?) as xs:integer?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Construct a dayTimeDuration from a number of days, hours, etc.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:dayTimeDuration
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:dayTimeDuration($days as xs:decimal?, $hours as xs:decimal?, $minutes as xs:decimal?, $seconds as xs:decimal?) as xs:dayTimeDuration

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Number of days in the month
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:days-in-month
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:days-in-month($date as xs:anyAtomicType?) as xs:integer?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The depth (level) of a node in an XML tree
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:depth-of-node
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:depth-of-node($node as node()?) as xs:integer

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The distinct names of all attributes in an XML fragment
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:distinct-attribute-names
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:distinct-attribute-names($nodes as node()*) as xs:string*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The XML nodes with distinct values, taking into account attributes and descendants
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $nodes the sequence of nodes to test

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:distinct-deep
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:distinct-deep($nodes as node()*) as node()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The distinct names of all elements in an XML fragment
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:distinct-element-names
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:distinct-element-names($nodes as node()*) as xs:string*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The distinct paths of all descendant elements in an XML fragment
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:distinct-element-paths
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:distinct-element-paths($nodes as node()*) as xs:string*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The distinct XML nodes in a sequence (by node identity)
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:distinct-nodes
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:distinct-nodes($nodes as node()*) as node()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts a timezone like "-05:00" or "Z" into xs:dayTimeDuration
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:duration-from-timezone
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:duration-from-timezone($timezone as xs:string) as xs:dayTimeDuration

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:dynamic-path
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:dynamic-path($parent as node(), $path as xs:string) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Escapes regex special characters

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:escape-for-regex
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:escape-for-regex($arg as xs:string?) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Whether one (and only one) of two boolean values is true
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:exclusive-or
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:exclusive-or($arg1 as xs:boolean?, $arg2 as xs:boolean?) as xs:boolean?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The first day of the month of a date

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:first-day-of-month
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:first-day-of-month($date as xs:anyAtomicType?) as xs:date?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:first-day-of-year
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:first-day-of-year($date as xs:anyAtomicType?) as xs:date?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The XML node in a sequence that appears first in document order
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:first-node
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:first-node($nodes as node()*) as node()?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: W3C XML Query Working Group

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:follows-not-descendant($a as node()?, $b as node()?) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:format-as-title-en
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:format-as-title-en($titles as xs:string*) as xs:string*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:fragment-from-uri($uri as xs:string?) as xs:string?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:get-matches-and-non-matches($string as xs:string?, $regex as xs:string) as element(*)*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:get-matches
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:get-matches($string as xs:string?, $regex as xs:string) as xs:string*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:has-element-only-content($element as element(*)) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:has-empty-content($element as element(*)) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:has-mixed-content
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:has-mixed-content($element as element(*)) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:has-simple-content
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:has-simple-content($element as element(*)) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:id-from-element($element as element(*)?) as xs:string?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $node the root node(s) to start from

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:id-untyped
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:id-untyped($node as node()*, $id as xs:anyAtomicType) as element(*)*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The first argument if it is not empty, otherwise the second argument
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: W3C XML Query WG
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $arg the item(s) that may be absent
$value the item(s) to use if the item is absent

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:if-absent
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:if-absent($arg as item()*, $value as item()*) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $arg the node that may be empty
$value the item(s) to use if the node is empty

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:if-empty
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:if-empty($arg as item()?, $value as item()*) as item()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The position of a node in a sequence, based on contents and attributes

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:index-of-deep-equal-node($nodes as node()*, $nodeToFind as node()) as xs:integer*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:index-of-match-first($arg as xs:string?, $pattern as xs:string) as xs:integer?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The position of a node in a sequence, based on node identity
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: W3C XML Query Working Group
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $nodeToFind the node to find in the sequence

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:index-of-node
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:index-of-node($nodes as node()*, $nodeToFind as node()) as xs:integer*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:index-of-string-first
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:index-of-string-first($arg as xs:string?, $substring as xs:string) as xs:integer?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:index-of-string-last
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:index-of-string-last($arg as xs:string?, $substring as xs:string) as xs:integer?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:index-of-string
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:index-of-string($arg as xs:string?, $substring as xs:string) as xs:integer*

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:insert-string($originalString as xs:string?, $stringToInsert as xs:string?, $pos as xs:integer) as xs:string

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:is-a-number($value as xs:anyAtomicType?) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:is-absolute-uri($uri as xs:string?) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Whether an XML node is an ancestor of another node
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:is-ancestor
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:is-ancestor($node1 as node(), $node2 as node()) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:is-descendant
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:is-descendant($node1 as node(), $node2 as node()) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:is-leap-year
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:is-leap-year($date as xs:anyAtomicType?) as xs:boolean

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:substring-before-match
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:substring-before-match($arg as xs:string?, $regex as xs:string) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Construct a time from an hour, minute and second
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:time
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:time($hour as xs:anyAtomicType, $minute as xs:anyAtomicType, $second as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:time

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Converts an xs:dayTimeDuration into a timezone like "-05:00" or "Z"
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:timezone-from-duration
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:timezone-from-duration($duration as xs:dayTimeDuration) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The total number of days in a dayTimeDuration
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:total-days-from-duration
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:total-days-from-duration($duration as xs:dayTimeDuration?) as xs:decimal?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The total number of hours in a dayTimeDuration
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:total-hours-from-duration
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:total-hours-from-duration($duration as xs:dayTimeDuration?) as xs:decimal?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The total number of minutes in a dayTimeDuration
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:total-minutes-from-duration
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:total-minutes-from-duration($duration as xs:dayTimeDuration?) as xs:decimal?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The total number of months in a yearMonthDuration
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:total-months-from-duration
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:total-months-from-duration($duration as xs:yearMonthDuration?) as xs:decimal?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The total number of seconds in a dayTimeDuration
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:total-seconds-from-duration
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:total-seconds-from-duration($duration as xs:dayTimeDuration?) as xs:decimal?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The total number of years in a yearMonthDuration
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:total-years-from-duration
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:total-years-from-duration($duration as xs:yearMonthDuration?) as xs:decimal?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Trims leading and trailing whitespace
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:trim
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:trim($arg as xs:string?) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Updates the attribute value of an XML element
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $elements the element(s) for which you wish to update the attribute
$attrNames the name(s) of the attribute(s) to add
$attrValues the value(s) of the attribute(s) to add

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:update-attributes
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:update-attributes($elements as element(*)*, $attrNames as xs:QName*, $attrValues as xs:anyAtomicType*) as element(*)?

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The values in one sequence that aren't in another sequence
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: W3C XML Query Working Group

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:value-except
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:value-except($arg1 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $arg2 as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:anyAtomicType*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The intersection of two sequences of values
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: W3C XML Query Working Group

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:value-intersect
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:value-intersect($arg1 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $arg2 as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:anyAtomicType*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The union of two sequences of values
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: W3C XML Query Working Group

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:value-union
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:value-union($arg1 as xs:anyAtomicType*, $arg2 as xs:anyAtomicType*) as xs:anyAtomicType*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: The number of words
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:word-count
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:word-count($arg as xs:string?) as xs:integer

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Turns a string of words into camelCase
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:words-to-camel-case
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:words-to-camel-case($arg as xs:string?) as xs:string

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Wraps a sequence of atomic values in XML elements
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $values the values to wrap in elements
$elementName the name of the elements to construct

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:wrap-values-in-elements
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:wrap-values-in-elements($values as xs:anyAtomicType*, $elementName as xs:QName) as element(*)*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Construct a yearMonthDuration from a number of years and months
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Priscilla Walmsley, Datypic

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: functx:yearMonthDuration
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function functx:yearMonthDuration($years as xs:decimal?, $months as xs:integer?) as xs:yearMonthDuration
